Sentencas: One of the most important indicators of solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC) is to maximize their production capacity.
Titulo: Parameters exploration of SOFC for dynamic simulation using adaptive chaotic grey wolf optimization algorithm

Sentencas: In this paper, the optimal values of SOFC unit are achieved using the combined model of the multi-layer perceptron neural network and different meta-heuristic optimization algorithms, including particle swarm optimization, ant colony optimization algorithm, genetic algorithm, Grey Wolf Optimizer, Multi-Verse Optimization algorithm, Accelerated Grey Wolf Optimization, Chaotic Grey Wolf Optimization, and Adaptive Chaotic Grey Wolf optimization hybrid algorithm.
Titulo: Parameters exploration of SOFC for dynamic simulation using adaptive chaotic grey wolf optimization algorithm

Sentencas: This article calculates the optimal decision factors such as power, temperature, voltage, and electrolyte thickness.
Titulo: Parameters exploration of SOFC for dynamic simulation using adaptive chaotic grey wolf optimization algorithm

Sentencas: The fuel cell modeling method is done by neural network training based on available experimental data.
Titulo: Parameters exploration of SOFC for dynamic simulation using adaptive chaotic grey wolf optimization algorithm

Sentencas: And the hyper-parameters of the neural network are obtained by optimization algorithms.
Titulo: Parameters exploration of SOFC for dynamic simulation using adaptive chaotic grey wolf optimization algorithm

Sentencas: Standard Error (SE), Mean Squared Error (MSE), Mean Absolute Percentage Error (MAPE), Root Mean Squared Error (RMSE), Mean Absolute Error (MAE), Relative absolute error (RAE), Pearson's correlation coefficient (R), and coefficient of determination (R-2) are applied as evaluation criteria.
Titulo: Parameters exploration of SOFC for dynamic simulation using adaptive chaotic grey wolf optimization algorithm

Sentencas: Results are presented for testing, learning, and total data mode.
Titulo: Parameters exploration of SOFC for dynamic simulation using adaptive chaotic grey wolf optimization algorithm

Sentencas: Comparison between the proposed method results and other well-known algorithms showed that the Adaptive Chaotic Grey Wolf optimization hybrid algorithm was superior in terms of performance criteria.
Titulo: Parameters exploration of SOFC for dynamic simulation using adaptive chaotic grey wolf optimization algorithm
